USyd HEURIST Search results http://heuristscholar.org/heurist This feed returns the results of a HEURIST search. bookmarks, social bookmarking, heuristics, bibliographic software 5131 http://heuristscholar.org/heurist
[search BIBLIO rss_search] [foreach BIBLIO searchrecordloop]
[rec_id] [if : rec_url][else]no url: [end-if][rec_title] [literal][end-literal][rec_scratchpad][literal][end-literal] [rec_modified] [rec_modified]
[if : rec_url] [rec_url] [else] http://heuristscholar.org/heurist/view.php?bib_id=[rec_id] [end-if]
[end-foreach] [end-search]
